pr_title: Record Force Merges in Live Commit Data

timeline.message:
Record Force Merges in live commit data

Prerequesite of #52182. Record force merges in the live commit data
so two shard states with the same sequence number that differ only in whether
or not they have been force merged can be distinguished when creating snapshots.

timeline.bodyText: should we also check the NA value and not write it out in that case? Otherwise it will be up to all readers to do the right thing? I find the NA / null handling a bit confusing here, and wonder if we should just have one of these. My preference would be to have it Nullable everywhere, and not introduce another "null" value that is NA.

timeline.bodyText: I would just use readOptionalString and writeOptionalString, no need for the extra FORCE_MERGE_UUID_NA_VALUE. It simplifies the code and no need for the extra value. Sending an extra byte on the wire does not hurt either.
